author: Dennis Gerike
description: Ticket generator for all API-related features in 'More Cars'
name: @more-cars/rest-api-ticket-generator

scripts.generate-tickets:node:create: HYGEN_OVERWRITE=1 HYGEN_TMPLS=./ hygen features create-node && node --env-file=.env -r ts-node/register create-tickets-for-create-node.ts
